item.title: Aguas Calientes or Machu Picchu Pueblo?
item.description: Machu Picchu Pueblo is the new name of Aguas Calientes Aguas Calientes translates into Warm Waters and refers to the local thermal springs The town can only be accessed on foot or by trainIt is here that the trains to Machu Picchu arrive and the buses depart Aguas Calientes has a large variety of hotels and restaurants Aguas Calientes is the old name of the town that is located in the valley down from the famous Inca site of Machu Picchu.
